attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many thousands of Iraqis have died as a direct consequence of Tony Blair's persuasion of the British parliament to back his decision to go to war with the USA against Iraq. This persuasion was later found to be based on false information (ironically called "intelligence"). We would like to hear the PM humbly say "sorry" for the terrible bloodshed he initiated. Then we can all go make a nice cup of tea, and everything will be ok.
